response.job_title: | Product Manager | Innovation Coordinator | Mechanical Engineer |
response.summary: Results-focused professional with strengths in leveraging hypothesis-based solutions using innovative problem-solving techniques such as Design Thinking, agile methodologies, and product development. Adept at managing multiple projects simultaneously, including planning, scheduling, and budget management while developing and maintaining project management tools to ensure effective communication and visibility across interdisciplinary and intercultural teams.
response.skills: Cross-functional Team Leadership, Agile Methodologies, Design Thinking, Building Information Modeling (BIM), Product Management, Product Innovation, Business Strategy, Scrum, Microsoft Excel, Matlab, Python

profile_positions.description:
Led full product development lifecycles from concept phase through final production by using design thinking an SCRUM methodologies
- Stablished business cases for innovation projects
- Supported the preparation of presentations and supporting materials for clients.
- Collaborated with peers and other design team members to discuss product
enhancements/features.
- Participated as BIM Manager for Electrical Intrastructure projects
- Designed project development timelines with key milestones and clear scope and delivery
requirements descriptions.
- Managed cross-functional workgroups tasked with multi-disciplinary reviews of new project
proposals by using SCRUM.
- Drafted documentation on technical information and production thresholds pertinent to software
or engineering products.
- Wrote performance requirements for product development and engineering projects.
- Communicated changes in project scope and timelines to stakeholders
profile_positions.title: Innovation Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Conceived and designed transmission towers
·Calculated Tower parts verifying their resistance according to the loads
·Worked with the assembly company to ensure changes in transmission tower parts and drawings
profile_positions.title: Junior Structural Civil Engineer
